backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing access control, approval workflows, and user registration for client, partner, and internal roles with ID generation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing required frontend dashboard changes and validation steps referencing ClientDashboard.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for numerous frontend files, outlining routing, UI behavior, and dashboard features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining color tokens, CSS variables, and light/dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Manual client-side router mapping paths to page components including dashboards, auth pages, and a 404 fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks managing Internet Identity login, state persistence, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Small placeholder hook wrapping a React Query call for a not-yet-implemented backend method.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and imports global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/_shared/PageShell.tsx: Provides a shared page wrapper with centered content, gradient background, and footer.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login page with disabled login options and links to registration and home.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form with input fields and disabled submit button.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Simple admin dashboard layout with header, disabled logout button, and status message.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Dashboard for Asistenmu users showing a thank‑you message with standard header/footer.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard fetching active services, preparing task buckets, and handling phase logic (tasks currently empty).
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Dashboard for Concierge users displaying a gratitude message with shared layout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Finance dashboard showing a health‑of‑flows status message with disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Partner dashboard presenting a motivational message within the shared gradient layout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Superadmin dashboard with tabs for summary, users, master data, rates, tasks, and layanan, managing extensive UI state and backend interactions.
Client login page handling Internet Identity login, user validation, and redirecting to registration or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/external/ClientRegist: Client registration page collecting profile data, submitting to backend, and redirecting after success.
frontend/src/pages/external/PartnerLogin: Partner login page using Internet Identity, verifying partner role, and routing to registration or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/external/PartnerRegis: Partner registration page for submitting profile details and navigating to dashboard after successful registration.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Simple internal landing page linking to login and registration for internal users.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Handles internal user authentication with Internet Identity, role extraction, superadmin claim checks, and redirects to role-specific dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Provides a form for internal staff registration using Internet Identity and submits profile data to the backend actor.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page offering client and partner login/registration links with styled layout.
Displays a disabled partner login page with UI elements for future authentication and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Shows a disabled partner registration form collecting basic personal and skill information.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme settings, colors, components, container behavior, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state version, scope updates for ClientDashboard changes, and architectural rules. Lists known frontend/backend issues affecting routing, role handling, and superadmin claim flow.
